languages.text: {n}Сенешаль сводит вместе густые брови.{/n} "Хм. Не могу сказать, что мне по нраву противостояние с Чордой... но вот пособничество ее методам меня точно не устраивает".
{n}The Seneschal furrows his thick eyebrows.{/n} "Hmm. I cannot say I approve of antagonising Chorda... but her methods being what they are, I definitely disapprove of assisting her."
languages.original_text: {n}Сенешаль сводит вместе густые брови.{/n} "Хм. Не могу сказать, что мне по нраву противостояние с Чордой... но вот пособничество ее методам меня точно не устраивает".

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德皱起了他的浓眉。{/n}“嗯，虽然我不是很赞成和库尔达作对……但就她的统治手段而言，我绝对不赞成协助她。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal furrows his thick eyebrows.{/n} "Hmm. I cannot say I approve of antagonising Chorda... but her methods being what they are, I definitely disapprove of assisting her."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德皱起了他的浓眉。{/n}“嗯，虽然我不是很赞成和库尔达作对……但就她的统治手段而言，我绝对不赞成协助她。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}家令長は太い眉をひそめた。{/n}「ふうむ。チョーダと敵対するのは賛成できなせんが…彼女のあのやり方を見るに、手助けをするのは絶対に反対です」
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal furrows his thick eyebrows.{/n} "Hmm. I cannot say I approve of antagonising Chorda... but her methods being what they are, I definitely disapprove of assisting her."

traits.locale_text: {n}家令長は太い眉をひそめた。{/n}「ふうむ。チョーダと敵対するのは賛成できなせんが…彼女のあのやり方を見るに、手助けをするのは絶対に反対です」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}El senescal frunce el ceño.{/n} «Hmm. No puedo decir que apruebe enemistarme con Chorda... pero, siendo sus métodos los que son, no estoy de acuerdo en ayudarla».
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal furrows his thick eyebrows.{/n} "Hmm. I cannot say I approve of antagonising Chorda... but her methods being what they are, I definitely disapprove of assisting her."

traits.locale_text: {n}El senescal frunce el ceño.{/n} «Hmm. No puedo decir que apruebe enemistarme con Chorda... pero, siendo sus métodos los que son, no estoy de acuerdo en ayudarla».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Truchsess legt die Stirn in Falten.{/n} "Hmm. Ich billige es nicht unbedingt, uns Chorda zur Feindin zu machen ... aber bei ihren Methoden missbillige ich es definitiv, ihr zu helfen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal furrows his thick eyebrows.{/n} "Hmm. I cannot say I approve of antagonising Chorda... but her methods being what they are, I definitely disapprove of assisting her."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Truchsess legt die Stirn in Falten.{/n} "Hmm. Ich billige es nicht unbedingt, uns Chorda zur Feindin zu machen ... aber bei ihren Methoden missbillige ich es definitiv, ihr zu helfen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le sénéchal fronce ses épais sourcils.{/n} « Hmm. Je ne peux pas dire que j'approuve votre décision de vous opposer à Chorda... mais ses méthodes étant ce qu'elles sont, je désapprouve totalement de l'aider. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal furrows his thick eyebrows.{/n} "Hmm. I cannot say I approve of antagonising Chorda... but her methods being what they are, I definitely disapprove of assisting her."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sénéchal fronce ses épais sourcils.{/n} « Hmm. Je ne peux pas dire que j'approuve votre décision de vous opposer à Chorda... mais ses méthodes étant ce qu'elles sont, je désapprouve totalement de l'aider. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Seneşal, kalın kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Hımm. Chorda'yı kışkırtmak pek katıldığım bir önerme değil ama... Kullandığı yöntemleri göz önünde bulundurursak ona yardım etmeye de hiç niyetli değilim."
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal furrows his thick eyebrows.{/n} "Hmm. I cannot say I approve of antagonising Chorda... but her methods being what they are, I definitely disapprove of assisting her."
